events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our recruitment team will review your resume and get back to you shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on your software development experience and skills mentioned in the resume.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile to assist you throughout the hiring process and answer any questions you might have.
Our hiring team conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background, skills, and motivation for joining our software engineering team.
You provided a detailed response addressing our questions and expressed strong enthusiasm for the opportunity to work in a dynamic engineering environment.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our lead developer for next week to further assess your coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
